name: Wrath of Zeus (A.4 Developer)
description:
Update1:

fixed a bug where you cant kill an enemy if there is one on top of it.

added a score system as alot asked for it.

added a new Slow-Time function that slows time by half.

the camera now shakes when summoning thunder to make it more impactful.

Better wave spawner and more balanced.

[Story]

after stealing the Gem from Zeus you gained a great power to  summon thunders upon your enemies. but now Zeus has sent his monsters to retrieve his gem. now your goal is to let nobody enter your castle and steal the gem.

kill enemies by summoning thunder where you click, the thunder color must Mach the enemy color.

[Controls]

Left mouse button to summon thunder

Right mouse button to Slow Time

A - for Red color

S - for Blue color

D - for Green color

please don't forget to rate the game and enjoy!!
